chapter.title: Shared file systems command-line client
chapter.para:
The manila client is the command-line interface (CLI) for the Shared file systems API and its extensions.
This chapter documents manila version 1.4.0.
For help on a specific manila command, enter:

listitem.para: Print a list of absolute limits for a user.
Allow access to the share.
Deny access to a share.
Show access list for share.
Display the API version information.
Creates a new consistency group.
Remove one or more consistency groups.
List consistency groups with filters.
Explicitly update the state of a consistency group.
Show details about a consistency group.
Creates a new consistency group.
Remove one or more consistency group snapshots.
List consistency group snapshots with filters.
Get member details for a consistency group snapshot.
Explicitly update the state of a consistency group.
Show details about a consistency group snapshot.
Update a consistency group snapshot.
Update a consistency group.
Creates a new share (NFS, CIFS, GlusterFS or HDFS).
Show user credentials returned from auth.
Remove one or more shares.
Discover endpoints that get returned from the authenticate services.
Increases the size of an existing share.
Print a list of current 'share types and extra specs' (Admin Only).
Attempt force-delete of share, regardless of state.
List NAS shares with filters.
Manage share not handled by Manila.
Set or delete metadata on a share.
Show metadata of given share.
Update all metadata of a share.
Migrates share to a new host.
List all backend storage pools known to the scheduler (Admin only).
List the quotas for a quota class.
Update the quotas for a quota class.
List the default quotas for a tenant.
Delete quota for a tenant/user. The quota will revert back to default.
List the quotas for a tenant/user.
Update the quotas for a tenant/user.
Print a list of rate limits for a user.
Explicitly update the state of a share.
Create security service used by tenant.
Delete security service.
Get a list of security services.
Show security service.
Update security service.
List all services.
Attempt force-delete of share instance, regardless of state.
List share instances.
Explicitly update the state of a share instance.
Show details about a share instance.
Create description for network used by the tenant.
Delete share network.
Get a list of network info.
Associate security service with share network.
Get list of security services associated with a given share network.
Dissociate security service from share network.
Get a description for network used by the tenant.
Update share network data.
Delete share server.
Show share server details.
List all share servers.
Show share server info.
Show details about a NAS share.
Decreases the size of an existing share.
Add a new snapshot.
Remove a snapshot.
Attempt force-delete of snapshot, regardless of state.
List all the snapshots.
Rename a snapshot.
Explicitly update the state of a snapshot.
Show details about a snapshot.
Adds share type access for the given project.
Print access information about the given share type.
Removes share type access for the given project.
Create a new share type.
Delete a specific share type.
Set or unset extra_spec for a share type.
Print a list of available 'share types'.
Unmanage share.
Rename a share.
Print arguments for bash_completion. Prints all of the commands and options to stdout so that the manila.bash_completion script doesn't have to hard code them.
Display help about this program or one of its subcommands.
List all the os-api extensions that are available.
show program's version number and exit
Print debugging output.
Use the auth token cache. Defaults to env[OS_CACHE].
Delete cached password and auth token.
Defaults to env[OS_USERNAME].
Defaults to env[OS_PASSWORD].
Defaults to env[OS_TENANT_NAME].
Defaults to env[OS_TENANT_ID].
Defaults to env[OS_AUTH_URL].
Defaults to env[OS_REGION_NAME].
Defaults to compute for most actions.
Defaults to env[MANILA_SERVICE_NAME].
Defaults to env[MANILA_share_service_name].
Defaults to env[MANILA_ENDPOINT_TYPE] or publicURL.
Accepts 1.x to override default to env[OS_SHARE_API_VERSION].
Specify a CA bundle file to use in verifying a TLS (https) server certificate. Defaults to env[OS_CACERT].
Number of retries.

section.title: manila absolute-limits
section.para: Print a list of absolute limits for a user.

section.title: manila access-allow
section.para: Allow access to the share.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the NAS share to modify.
Access rule type (only "ip", "user"(user or group), and "cert" are supported).
Value that defines access.
Share access level ("rw" and "ro" access levels are supported). Defaults to None.

section.title: manila access-deny
section.para: Deny access to a share.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the NAS share to modify.
ID of the access rule to be deleted.

section.title: manila access-list
section.para: Show access list for share.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share.

section.title: manila api-version
section.para: Display the API version information.

section.title: manila cg-create
section.para: Creates a new consistency group.

listitem.para: Optional consistency group name. (Default=None)
Optional consistency group description. (Default=None)
Optional list of share types. (Default=None)
Specify share-network name or id.
Optional snapshot ID to create the share from. (Default=None)

section.title: manila cg-delete
section.para: Remove one or more consistency groups.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the consistency group(s).
Attempt to force delete the consistency group (Default=False).

section.title: manila cg-list
section.para: List consistency groups with filters.

listitem.para: Display information from all tenants (Admin only).
Maximum number of consistency groups to return. (Default=None)
Start position of consistency group listing.

section.title: manila cg-reset-state
section.para: Explicitly update the state of a consistency group.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the consistency group state to modify.
Indicate which state to assign the consistency group. Options include available, error, creating, deleting, error_deleting. If no state is provided, available will be used.

section.title: manila cg-show
section.para: Show details about a consistency group.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the consistency group.

section.title: manila cg-snapshot-create
section.para: Creates a new consistency group.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the consistency group.
Optional consistency group snapshot name. (Default=None)
Optional consistency group snapshot description. (Default=None)

section.title: manila cg-snapshot-delete
section.para: Remove one or more consistency group snapshots.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the consistency group snapshot.
Attempt to force delete the cg snapshot(s) (Default=False).

section.title: manila cg-snapshot-list
section.para: List consistency group snapshots with filters.

listitem.para: Display information from all tenants (Admin only).
Maximum number of consistency group snapshots to return.(Default=None)
Start position of consistency group snapshot listing.
Show detailed information about snapshots.

section.title: manila cg-snapshot-members
section.para: Get member details for a consistency group snapshot.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the consistency group snapshot.
Maximum number of shares to return. (Default=None)
Start position of security services listing.

section.title: manila cg-snapshot-reset-state
section.para: Explicitly update the state of a consistency group.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the consistency group snapshot.
Indicate which state to assign the consistency group. Options include available, error, creating, deleting, error_deleting. If no state is provided, available will be used.

section.title: manila cg-snapshot-show
section.para: Show details about a consistency group snapshot.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the consistency group snapshot.

section.title: manila cg-snapshot-update
section.para: Update a consistency group snapshot.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the cg snapshot to update.
Optional new name for the cg snapshot. (Default=None
Optional cg snapshot description. (Default=None)

section.title: manila cg-update
section.para: Update a consistency group.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the consistency group to update.
Optional new name for the consistency group. (Default=None)
Optional consistency group description. (Default=None)

section.title: manila create
section.para: Creates a new share (NFS, CIFS, GlusterFS or HDFS).

listitem.para: Share type (NFS, CIFS, GlusterFS or HDFS).
Share size in GB.
Optional snapshot ID to create the share from. (Default=None)
Optional share name. (Default=None)
Metadata key=value pairs (Optional, Default=None).
Optional network info ID or name.
Optional share description. (Default=None)
Optional share type. Use of optional volume type is deprecated(Default=None)
Level of visibility for share. Defines whether other tenants are able to see it or not.
Availability zone in which share should be created.
Optional consistency group name or ID in which to create the share. (Default=None)

section.title: manila credentials
section.para: Show user credentials returned from auth.

section.title: manila delete
section.para: Remove one or more shares.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share(s).
Optional consistency group name or ID which contains the share. (Default=None)

section.title: manila endpoints
section.para: Discover endpoints that get returned from the authenticate services.

section.title: manila extend
section.para: Increases the size of an existing share.

listitem.para: Name or ID of share to extend.
New size of share, in GBs.

section.title: manila extra-specs-list
section.para: Print a list of current 'share types and extra specs' (Admin Only).

section.title: manila force-delete
section.para: Attempt force-delete of share, regardless of state.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share(s) to force delete.

section.title: manila list
section.para: List NAS shares with filters.

listitem.para: Display information from all tenants (Admin only).
Filter results by name.
Filter results by status.
Filter results by share server ID.
Filters results by a metadata key and value. OPTIONAL: Default=None
Filters results by a extra specs key and value of share type that was used for share creation. OPTIONAL: Default=None
Filter results by a share type id or name that was used for share creation.
Maximum number of shares to return. OPTIONAL: Default=None.
Set offset to define start point of share listing. OPTIONAL: Default=None.

Key to be sorted, available keys are ('id', 'status', 'size', 'host', 'share_proto', 'export_location', 'availability_zone', 'user_id', 'project_id', 'created_at', 'updated_at', 'display_name', 'name', 'share_type_id', 'share_type', 'share_network_id', 'share_network', 'snapshot_id', 'snapshot'). OPTIONAL: Default=None.
Sort direction, available values are ('asc', 'desc'). OPTIONAL: Default=None.
Filer results by snapshot name or id, that was used for share.
Filter results by host.
Filter results by share-network name or id.
Filter results by project id. Useful with set key '--all-tenants'.
Add public shares from all tenants to result.
Filter results by consistency group name or ID.

section.title: manila list-extensions
section.para: List all the os-api extensions that are available.

section.title: manila manage
section.para: Manage share not handled by Manila.

listitem.para: manage-share service host: some.host@driver#pool
Protocol of the share to manage, such as NFS or CIFS.
Share export path, NFS share such as: 10.0.0.1:/foo_path, CIFS share such as: \10.0.0.1 oo_name_of_cifs_share
Optional share name. (Default=None)
Optional share description. (Default=None)
Optional share type assigned to share. (Default=None)
Driver option key=value pairs (Optional, Default=None).

section.title: manila metadata
section.para: Set or delete metadata on a share.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share to update metadata on.
Actions: 'set' or 'unset'.
Metadata to set or unset (key is only necessary on unset).

section.title: manila metadata-show
section.para: Show metadata of given share.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share.

section.title: manila metadata-update-all
section.para: Update all metadata of a share.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share to update metadata on.
Metadata entry or entries to update.

section.title: manila migrate
section.para: Migrates share to a new host.

listitem.para: Name or ID of share to migrate.
Destination host and pool.
Enables or disables generic host-based force- migration, which bypasses driver optimizations. Default=False.

section.title: manila pool-list
section.para: List all backend storage pools known to the scheduler (Admin only).

listitem.para: Filter results by host name. Regular expressions are supported.
Filter results by backend name. Regular expressions are supported.
Filter results by pool name. Regular expressions are supported.

section.title: manila quota-class-show
section.para: List the quotas for a quota class.

listitem.para: Name of quota class to list the quotas for.

section.title: manila quota-class-update
section.para: Update the quotas for a quota class.

listitem.para: Name of quota class to set the quotas for.
New value for the "shares" quota.
New value for the "snapshots" quota.
New value for the "gigabytes" quota.
New value for the "snapshot_gigabytes" quota.
New value for the "share_networks" quota.

section.title: manila quota-defaults
section.para: List the default quotas for a tenant.

listitem.para: ID of tenant to list the default quotas for.

section.title: manila quota-delete
section.para: Delete quota for a tenant/user. The quota will revert back to default.

listitem.para: ID of tenant to delete quota for.
ID of user to delete quota for.

section.title: manila quota-show
section.para: List the quotas for a tenant/user.

listitem.para: ID of tenant to list the quotas for.
ID of user to list the quotas for.

section.title: manila quota-update
section.para: Update the quotas for a tenant/user.

listitem.para: UUID of tenant to set the quotas for.
ID of user to set the quotas for.
New value for the "shares" quota.
New value for the "snapshots" quota.
New value for the "gigabytes" quota.
New value for the "snapshot_gigabytes" quota.
New value for the "share_networks" quota.
Whether force update the quota even if the already used and reserved exceeds the new quota.

section.title: manila rate-limits
section.para: Print a list of rate limits for a user.

section.title: manila reset-state
section.para: Explicitly update the state of a share.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share to modify.
Indicate which state to assign the share. Options include available, error, creating, deleting, error_deleting. If no state is provided, available will be used.

section.title: manila security-service-create
section.para: Create security service used by tenant.

listitem.para: Security service type: 'ldap', 'kerberos' or 'active_directory'.
DNS IP address used inside tenant's network.
Security service IP address or hostname.
Security service domain.
Security service user or group used by tenant.
Password used by user.
Security service name.
Security service description.

section.title: manila security-service-delete
section.para: Delete security service.

listitem.para: Security service name or ID to delete.

section.title: manila security-service-list
section.para: Get a list of security services.

listitem.para: Display information from all tenants (Admin only).
Filter results by share network id or name.
Filter results by status.
Filter results by name.
Filter results by type.
Filter results by user or group used by tenant.
Filter results by DNS IP address used inside tenant's network.
Filter results by security service IP address or hostname.
Filter results by domain.
Show detailed information about filtered security services.
Start position of security services listing.
Number of security services to return per request.

section.title: manila security-service-show
section.para: Show security service.

listitem.para: Security service name or ID to show.

section.title: manila security-service-update
section.para: Update security service.

listitem.para: Security service name or ID to update.
DNS IP address used inside tenant's network.
Security service IP address or hostname.
Security service domain.
Security service user or group used by tenant.
Password used by user.
Security service name.
Security service description.

section.title: manila service-list
section.para: List all services.

listitem.para: Name of host.
Service binary.
Filter results by status.
Filter results by state.
Availability zone.

section.title: manila share-instance-force-delete
section.para: Attempt force-delete of share instance, regardless of state.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the instance(s) to force delete.

section.title: manila share-instance-list
section.para: List share instances.

listitem.para: Filter results by share ID.

section.title: manila share-instance-reset-state
section.para: Explicitly update the state of a share instance.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share instance to modify.
Indicate which state to assign the instance. Options include available, error, creating, deleting, error_deleting. If no state is provided, available will be used.

section.title: manila share-instance-show
section.para: Show details about a share instance.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share instance.

section.title: manila share-network-create
section.para: Create description for network used by the tenant.

listitem.para: Nova net ID. Used to set up network for share servers.
Neutron network ID. Used to set up network for share servers.
Neutron subnet ID. Used to set up network for share servers. This subnet should belong to specified neutron network.
Share network name.
Share network description.

section.title: manila share-network-delete
section.para: Delete share network.

listitem.para: Name or ID of share network to be deleted.

section.title: manila share-network-list
section.para: Get a list of network info.

listitem.para: Display information from all tenants (Admin only).
Filter results by project ID.
Filter results by name.
Return only share networks created since given date. The date is in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd'.
Return only share networks created until given date. The date is in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd'.
Filter results by attached security service.
Filter results by Nova net ID.
Filter results by neutron net ID.
Filter results by neutron subnet ID.
Filter results by network type.
Filter results by segmentation ID.
Filter results by CIDR.
Filter results by IP version.
Start position of share networks listing.
Number of share networks to return per request.

section.title: manila share-network-security-service-add
section.para: Associate security service with share network.

listitem.para: Share network name or ID.
Security service name or ID to associate with.

section.title: manila share-network-security-service-list
section.para: Get list of security services associated with a given share network.

listitem.para: Share network name or ID.

section.title: manila share-network-security-service-remove
section.para: Dissociate security service from share network.

listitem.para: Share network name or ID.
Security service name or ID to dissociate.

section.title: manila share-network-show
section.para: Get a description for network used by the tenant.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share network to show.

section.title: manila share-network-update
section.para: Update share network data.

listitem.para: Name or ID of share network to update.
Nova net ID. Used to set up network for share servers.
Neutron network ID. Used to set up network for share servers.
Neutron subnet ID. Used to set up network for share servers. This subnet should belong to specified neutron network.
Share network name.
Share network description.

section.title: manila share-server-delete
section.para: Delete share server.

listitem.para: ID of share server.

section.title: manila share-server-details
section.para: Show share server details.

listitem.para: ID of share server.

section.title: manila share-server-list
section.para: List all share servers.

listitem.para: Filter results by name of host.
Filter results by status.
Filter results by share network.
Filter results by project ID.

section.title: manila share-server-show
section.para: Show share server info.

listitem.para: ID of share server.

section.title: manila show
section.para: Show details about a NAS share.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the NAS share.

section.title: manila shrink
section.para: Decreases the size of an existing share.

listitem.para: Name or ID of share to shrink.
New size of share, in GBs.

section.title: manila snapshot-create
section.para: Add a new snapshot.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share to snapshot.
Optional flag to indicate whether to snapshot a share even if it's busy. (Default=False)
Optional snapshot name. (Default=None)
Optional snapshot description. (Default=None)

section.title: manila snapshot-delete
section.para: Remove a snapshot.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the snapshot to delete.

section.title: manila snapshot-force-delete
section.para: Attempt force-delete of snapshot, regardless of state.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the snapshot to force delete.

section.title: manila snapshot-list
section.para: List all the snapshots.

listitem.para: Display information from all tenants (Admin only).
Filter results by name.
Filter results by status.
Filter results by source share ID.
Either filter or not snapshots by its usage. OPTIONAL: Default=any.
Maximum number of share snapshots to return. OPTIONAL: Default=None.
Set offset to define start point of share snapshots listing. OPTIONAL: Default=None.
Key to be sorted, available keys are ('id', 'status', 'size', 'share_id', 'user_id', 'project_id', 'progress', 'name', 'display_name'). Default=None.
Sort direction, available values are ('asc', 'desc'). OPTIONAL: Default=None.

section.title: manila snapshot-rename
section.para: Rename a snapshot.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the snapshot to rename.
New name for the snapshot.
Optional snapshot description. (Default=None)

section.title: manila snapshot-reset-state
section.para: Explicitly update the state of a snapshot.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the snapshot to modify.
Indicate which state to assign the snapshot. Options include available, error, creating, deleting, error_deleting. If no state is provided, available will be used.

section.title: manila snapshot-show
section.para: Show details about a snapshot.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the snapshot.

section.title: manila type-access-add
section.para: Adds share type access for the given project.

listitem.para: Share type name or ID to add access for the given project.
Project ID to add share type access for.

section.title: manila type-access-list
section.para: Print access information about the given share type.

listitem.para: Filter results by share type name or ID.

section.title: manila type-access-remove
section.para: Removes share type access for the given project.

listitem.para: Share type name or ID to remove access for the given project.
Project ID to remove share type access for.

section.title: manila type-create
section.para: Create a new share type.

listitem.para: Name of the new share type.
Required extra specification. Valid values are 'true'/'1' and 'false'/'0'
Boolean extra spec that used for filtering of back ends by their capability to create share snapshots. (Default is True).
Make type accessible to the public (default true).

section.title: manila type-delete
section.para: Delete a specific share type.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share type to delete.

section.title: manila type-key
section.para: Set or unset extra_spec for a share type.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share type.
Actions: 'set' or 'unset'.
Extra_specs to set or unset (key is only necessary on unset).

section.title: manila type-list
section.para: Print a list of available 'share types'.

listitem.para: Display all share types (Admin only).

section.title: manila unmanage
section.para: Unmanage share.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share(s).

section.title: manila update
section.para: Rename a share.

listitem.para: Name or ID of the share to rename.
New name for the share.
Optional share description. (Default=None)
Public share is visible for all tenants.
